answerText: The Sea of Fertility[10] The Sea of Fertility tetralogy was written by this tortured Japanese author, who wrote about the stammering vengeful misfit Mizoguchi burning down the title structure in his Temple of the Golden Pavillion.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 4 | 4 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one novel in this series, the protagonist visits the Anjata caves but is denied entrance to the Chakri palace. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this series of novels that includes Spring Snow and the Decay of the Angel centering on Shigekuni Honda's repeated attempts to save his repeatedly reincarnating friend.
